connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

http_proxy.description:
"description: 
 parameters:
     username:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Username used to authenticate with the HTTP Proxy
     name:
       required: true
       type: string
       description: The HTTP Proxy name
     url:
       required: true
       type: string
       description: URL of the HTTP Proxy
     location_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: REPLACE locations with given ids
     password:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Password used to authenticate with the HTTP Proxy
     organization_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: REPLACE organizations with given ids.
     "

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
